GeneralTokenMissing.title: Token is missing
GeneralTokenMissing.detail: A token must be provided in the 'Authorization' header to access this endpoint.
GeneralTokenMissing.userDetail: You need to be logged in to do this.

GeneralTokenInvalid.title: Token is invalid
GeneralTokenInvalid.detail: The token provided for authorization is invalid. Try logging in again to obtain a valid token.

GeneralTokenExpired.title: Token is expired
GeneralTokenExpired.detail: The token provided for authorization is expired. Try logging in again to obtain a valid token.

GeneralInvalidJson.title: Incorrectly formatted JSON
GeneralInvalidJson.detail: The request body is incorrectly formatted. Ensure it is valid JSON.

BrawlersNotFound.title: Brawler not found
BrawlersNotFound.detail: The brawler ID provided does not match any brawlers.

SkinsNotFound.title: Skin not found
SkinsNotFound.detail: The skin ID provided does not match any of the brawler's skins.

SkinSearchInvalidFilters.title: Invalid filters object
SkinSearchInvalidFilters.detail: The search filters provided has an invalid type. It must be an object.

SkinSearchTooManyGroups.title: Too many skin groups selected
SkinSearchTooManyGroups.detail: The search filters provided includes too many skin group choices. Select at most 5.

EventsInvalidSeasonTime.title: Invalid time input
EventsInvalidSeasonTime.detail: The season time and later settings require 'hour', 'minute', and 'second' parameters that should all be numbers."

EventsInvalidWorldTime.title: Invalid time input
EventsInvalidWorldTime.detail: The world time setting requires a 'second' parameter that should be a number.

EventsInvalidSetting.title: Invalid time setting
EventsInvalidSetting.detail: The time setting provided is invalid. Valid settings are 'current', 'worldtime', 'seasontime', or 'later'."

GameModesNotFound.title: Game mode not found
GameModesNotFound.detail: The game mode ID provided does not match any game modes.

MapsNotFound.title: Map not found
MapsNotFound.detail: The map ID provided does not match any maps.

LoginMissing.title: Username or password is missing
LoginMissing.detail: The username and password must be in the 'username' and 'password' properties.

LoginIncorrect.title: Incorrect username or password
LoginIncorrect.detail: Failed to authenticate. Ensure the provided username and password are correct.

SignupLongUsername.title: Username or password is too long
SignupLongUsername.detail: Maximum username length is 20 and maximum password length is 100.
SignupLongUsername.userDetail: Username or password is too long. Maximum username length is 20 and maximum password length is 100.

SignupShortUsername.title: Username or password is too short
SignupShortUsername.detail: Minimum username length is 2 and minimum password length is 3.
SignupShortUsername.userDetail: Username or password is too short. Minimum username length is 2 and minimum password length is 3.

SignupInvalidUsername.title: Invalid username
SignupInvalidUsername.detail: One or more characters in the provided username are not allowed. Use only letters, numbers, and underscores."
SignupInvalidUsername.userDetail: One or more characters in the provided username are not allowed. Use only letters, numbers, and underscores.

UpdateShortPassword.title: Password is too short
UpdateShortPassword.detail: New password is too short. Minimum password length is 3.
UpdateShortPassword.userDetail: New password is too short. Minimum password length is 3.

UpdateMissing.title: Current password is missing
UpdateMissing.detail: To change passwords, the current password must be provided in the 'currentPassword' property."
UpdateMissing.userDetail: Your current password is required to change passwords.

UpdateIncorrect.title: Current password is incorrect
UpdateIncorrect.detail: The current password provided does not match the account's password.

AccessoriesClaimMissing.title: Accessory to claim is missing
AccessoriesClaimMissing.detail: The accessory ID to claim must be in the 'accessory' property.

AccessoriesNotFound.title: Accessory not found
AccessoriesNotFound.detail: The accessory ID provided does not match any accessories.

AccessoriesAlreadyUnlocked.title: Accessory already unlocked
AccessoriesAlreadyUnlocked.detail: The accessory to claim has already been unlocked. Accessories can only be claimed once.

AccessoriesClaimDenied.title: Not allowed to claim Accessory
AccessoriesClaimDenied.detail: You do not meet the requirements to claim this accessory.
AccessoriesClaimDenied.userDetail: You do not meet the requirements to claim this accessory.

AccessoriesShopDenied.title: Not allowed to claim Accessory
AccessoriesShopDenied.detail: The accessory to claim is only available from the shop. Set the 'buyFromShop' property to true to buy this accessory.
AccessoriesShopDenied.userDetail: This accessory is only available from the shop.

AccessoriesCannotAfford.title: Cannot afford to buy Accessory
AccessoriesCannotAfford.detail: You do not have enough coins to buy this accessory.
AccessoriesCannotAfford.userDetail: You do not have enough coins to buy this accessory.

CharactersMissing.title: Brawler is missing
CharactersMissing.detail: The character ID of the brawler to upgrade must be in the 'character' property.

CharactersNotFound.title: Brawler not found
CharactersNotFound.detail: The character ID provided does not match any brawlers that can be upgraded.

CharactersCannotAfford.title: Cannot afford to upgrade
CharactersCannotAfford.detail: You do not have enough coins to upgrade this brawler.
CharactersCannotAfford.userDetail: You do not have enough coins to upgrade this brawler.

CharactersUpgradeDenied.title: Not allowed to upgrade
CharactersUpgradeDenied.detail: You do not meet the requirements to upgrade this brawler.
CharactersUpgradeDenied.userDetail: You do not meet the requirements to upgrade this brawler.

CharactersMaxLevel.title: Already at max level
CharactersMaxLevel.detail: Brawler is already at maximum level and cannot be upgraded any further.
CharactersMaxLevel.userDetail: Brawler is already at maximum level and cannot be upgraded any further.

ChallengesGetMissing.title: Challenge key is missing
ChallengesGetMissing.detail: The key for the challenge to play should be in the 'key' property.

ChallengesGetNotFound.title: Challenge not found
ChallengesGetNotFound.detail: The key provided does not match any active challenge.

ChallengesAccepted.title: Challenge already started
ChallengesAccepted.detail: This challenge has already been played. To play again, go back then start the challenge again."
ChallengesAccepted.userDetail: Challenge already started. To play again, go back then start the challenge again.

ChallengesStartMissing.title: Challenge ID is missing
ChallengesStartMissing.detail: The challenge ID to start should be in the 'challengeid' property.

ChallengesStartNotFound.title: Challenge does not exist
ChallengesStartNotFound.detail: The challenge ID provided does not match any challenges that can be started.
